p: The cytotoxicity was evaluated by the [3H] thymidine assay using breast cancer (MCF-7) and colon cancer (COLO-205) cell lines. Doxorubicin (10 µg), was used as a positive control with ED 50 (50% effective dose) value of 1.8 µg/mL against MCF-7 cell line. Compound 362 showed cytotoxic activity against MCF-7 cell line with ED 50 value of >10 µg/mL [ 116].
